::Perndabot::

Perndabot grins. This was more like it. He was begining to hope that the 
Maximals might follow her, so he could slag several of them. He nods.

"I don't mind in the slightest," he says, finding his eyes a bit easier to 
focus on her face now that she didn't have her hands above her head, "But 
they would detect me waiting outside their base."
